body_html: @drpngx Thank you for your answer. I can see InplaceUpdate in the C++ docs, which even though (I think?) it's not as flexible as the variable slice assignment seems to be indeed what I was referring to. However, I cannot find how to actually use this kind of operation from Python.
body_text: @drpngx Thank you for your answer. I can see InplaceUpdate in the C++ docs, which even though (I think?) it's not as flexible as the variable slice assignment seems to be indeed what I was referring to. However, I cannot find how to actually use this kind of operation from Python.
body: @drpngx Thank you for your answer. I can see [`InplaceUpdate`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/cc/class/tensorflow/ops/inplace-update) in the C++ docs, which even though (I think?) it's not as flexible as the variable slice assignment seems to be indeed what I was referring to. However, I cannot find how to actually use this kind of operation from Python.
